name: LearntheWord
0:
”Alexa ask happy learning Tell me the Names of 5 Colors”
”List me the Names of 10 Cities”
”What are the 3 Animals”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: happy learning
des: The Skill aims to engage and empower more kids to get quick learning by interacting with the devices, current version supports the list of Animals, Colors and Cities but categories will be extended in near future
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
